CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The trend in the V OC of the PSCs can be explained by the HOMO energy level of the polymers because the V OC is typically linearly proportional to the difference in energy between the HOMO of the polymer and the LUMO of the acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO of the polymers |
| LUMO of the acceptor |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO of the polymers |
| LUMO of the acceptor |

(Note: VOC and PSCs were not identified as material names in the original paragraph as they are acronyms for "Volume of Chemical Adsorbed" and "Photoelectrochemical Cells" respectively, and do not clearly refer to specific materials.)

| Acceptor |
| Energy level of the HOMO and LUMO |

Paragraph: The trend in the V OC of the PSCs can be explained by the HOMO energy level of the polymers because the V OC is typically linearly proportional to the difference in energy between the HOMO of the polymer and the LUMO of the acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |

Note: VOC (Volume Optical Coordinate) is not a material property, it is a measurement or value obtained from a material. Therefore, it is considered a property value.
